data.text: Nothing will work unless you do.
data.author: Maya Angelou

data.text: Being a good example is the best form of service.
data.author: Sathya Sai Baba

data.text: You are not stuck where you are unless you decide to be.
data.author: Wayne Dyer

data.text: We should not look back unless it is to derive useful lessons from past errors.
data.author: George Washington

data.text: Never confuse a single defeat with a final defeat.
data.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

data.text: The season of failure is the best time for sowing the seeds of success.
data.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

data.text: Our deeds determine us, as much as we determine our deeds.
data.author: George Eliot

data.text: If you want to make God laugh, tell him about your plans.
data.author: Woody Allen

data.text: There is no way to happiness - happiness is the way.
data.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

data.text: In the middle of chaos lies opportunity.
data.author: Bruce Lee

data.text: I am always doing what I cannot do yet, in order to learn how to do it.
data.author: Vincent van Gogh

data.text: When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be.
data.author: Lao Tzu

data.text: By the practice of meditation, you will find that you are carrying within your heart a portable paradise.
data.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

data.text: An inventor is a man who asks Why? of the universe and lets nothing stand between the answer and his mind.
data.author: Ayn Rand

data.text: The two most powerful warriors are patience and time.
data.author: Leo Tolstoy

data.text: What gets measured gets improved.
data.author: Robin Sharma

data.text: Extraordinary results happen only when you give the best you have to become the best you can be at your most important work.
data.author: Gary Keller

data.text: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity. The fears are paper tigers.
data.author: Amelia Earhart

data.text: If you only knew the magnificence of the 3, 6, and 9, then you would have a key to the universe.
data.author: Nikola Tesla

data.text: Keep away from people who try to belittle your ambitions.
data.author: Mark Twain

data.text: Give more than you think you can, trusting that you are richer than you think.
data.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

data.text: Throughout this life, you can never be certain of living long enough to take another breath.
data.author: Huang Po

data.text: Don't try to be young. Just open your mind. Stay interested in stuff.
data.author: Betty White

data.text: A man has to learn that he cannot command things but that he can command himself; that he cannot coerce the wills of others but that he can mold and master his own will.
data.author: James Allen

data.text: Make improvements, not excuses. Seek respect, not attention.
data.author: Roy T. Bennett

data.text: The more perfect a person is on the outside, the more demons they have on the inside.
data.author: Sigmund Freud

data.text: Don't let the past steal your present.
data.author: Cherralea Morgen

data.text: The fear of death follows from the fear of life. A man who lives fully is prepared to die at any time.
data.author: Mark Twain

data.text: One of the oldest human needs is having someone to wonder where you are when you don't come home at night.
data.author: Margaret Mead

data.text: Victims recite problems, leaders provide solutions.
data.author: Robin Sharma

data.text: Any idea, plan, or purpose may be placed in the mind through repetition of thought.
data.author: Napoleon Hill

data.text: Blessed is he who expects nothing, for he shall never be disappointed.
data.author: Alexander Pope

data.text: You get paid in direct proportion to the difficulty of problems you solve.
data.author: Elon Musk

data.text: Think and wonder, wonder and think.
data.author: Dr. Seuss

data.text: People are weird. When we find someone with weirdness that is compatible with ours, we team up and call it love.
data.author: Dr. Seuss

data.text: He who leaves the game wins it.
data.author: Nicolas Chamfort

data.text: You have the ability, now apply yourself.
data.author: Benjamin Mays

data.text: You were born to win, but to be a winner you must plan to win, prepare to win, and expect to win.
data.author: Zig Ziglar

data.text: The search for happiness is one of the chief sources of unhappiness.
data.author: Eric Hoffer

data.text: Unexpressed emotions will never die. They are buried alive and will come forth later in uglier ways.
data.author: Sigmund Freud

data.text: Happiness cannot be traveled to, owned, earned, worn or consumed.
data.author: Denis Waitley

data.text: You need to be doing fewer things for more effect instead of doing more things with side effects.
data.author: Gary Keller

data.text: A man who cannot tolerate small misfortunes can never accomplish great things.
data.author: Chinese Proverb

data.text: All problems are illusions of the mind.
data.author: Eckhart Tolle

data.text: We know nothing of tomorrow, our business is to be good and happy today.
data.author: Sydney Smith

data.text: Humor isn't for everyone. It's only for people who want to have fun, enjoy life, and feel alive.
data.author: Anne Wilson Schaef

data.text: The sun shines upon good and bad alike.
data.author: Hans Christian Andersen

data.text: Success is never final, failure is never fatal. It's courage that counts.
data.author: John Wooden

data.text: The only way round is through.
data.author: Robert Frost

data.text: Science can flourish only in an atmosphere of free speech.
data.author: Albert Einstein
